briefdescription.para: Boundary condition to apply to the image filter.

memberdef.argsstring: (const NdArray< dtype > &inImageArray, uint32 inSize, Boundary inBoundaryType=Boundary::REFLECT, dtype inConstantValue=0)
memberdef.name: complementaryMedianFilter

detaileddescription.para: Calculates a multidimensional complemenatry median filter.

parameterdescription.para: square size of the kernel to apply
boundary mode (default Reflect) options (reflect, constant, nearest, mirror, wrap)
contant value if boundary = 'constant' (default 0)

memberdef.argsstring: (const NdArray< dtype > &inImageArray, uint32 inSize, Boundary inBoundaryType=Boundary::REFLECT, dtype inConstantValue=0)
memberdef.name: complementaryMedianFilter1d

detaileddescription.para: Calculate a one-dimensional complemenatry median filter.

parameterdescription.para: square size of the kernel to apply
boundary mode (default Reflect) options (reflect, constant, nearest, mirror, wrap)
contant value if boundary = 'constant' (default 0)
